Question: Which of the following statements are true regarding the characters in the movie featuring Harman Baweja and Priyanka Chopra?
Options:
A. a) Harman Baweja's character is romantically linked to Priyanka Chopra's character.
B. b) Priyanka Chopra plays a dual role in the movie.
C. c) Sana Bedi is the only character played by Priyanka Chopra.
D. d) Priyanka Chopra's character has a love interest in the movie.
Answer: a) Harman Baweja's character is romantically linked to Priyanka Chopra's character. and b) Priyanka Chopra plays a dual role in the movie.
